data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jia, Fenglong, Tang, Yu-dan (2018): A faunistic study of genus Chasmogenus Sharp, 1882 of China (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae). ZooKeys 738: 59-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.738.21711, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.738.21711
